official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of Congress that incentives to encourage home ownership be maintained as an integral part of fiscal policy in the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that any proposal considering changes to the Internal Revenue Code retain and expand incentives for home ownership.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of Congress that incentives to encourage home ownership be maintained as an integral part of fiscal policy in the United States.
